Title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
Writer: Earl Barret (story), Arne Sultan (story), Marvin Worth (story), Earl Barret (screenplay), Arne Sultan (screenplay), Eliot Wald (screenplay), Andrew Kurtzman (screenplay), Gene Wilder (screenplay)
Actors: Richard Pryor, Gene Wilder, Joan Severance, Kevin Spacey
Plot: Dave is deaf, and Wally is blind. They witness a murder, but it was Dave who was looking at her, and Wally who was listening.
